title: 79/638/EEC: Commission Decision of 4 July 1979 refusing to accept the scientific character of the apparatus described as 'PMS data acquisition system, model DAS-32'
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 4 July 1979  refusing to accept the scientific character of the apparatus described as "PMS data acquisition system, model DAS-32"  (79/638/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF. THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "PMS data acquisition system, model DAS-32" is not considered to be a scientific apparatus.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
